com.adobe.aem.commons.assetshare.components.predicates

Interface Predicate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, com.adobe.cq.wcm.core.components.models.form.Field
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatePredicate, HiddenPredicate, PagePredicate, PathPredicate, PropertyPredicate, SortPredicate, TagsPredicate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPredicate

    @ConsumerType
public interface Predicate
extends Component, com.adobe.cq.wcm.core.components.models.form.Field

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String getComponentUpdateMethod()
      Intended to drive the the data-asset-share-update-method attribute value in a component.

      In version 1.x.x of this project, this will always be "asset-share-commons__form-id__1".

      This value is initiated in internal initialized state.

      GUIDANCE NOTICE It is (almost) always preferred to use getInitialValues() even if only one initial value is present as it allows for easier and better future-proofing and extension.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.adobe.aem.commons.assetshare.components.Component

        isReady

      • Methods inherited from interface com.adobe.cq.wcm.core.components.models.form.Field

    • Method Detail

      • getFormId

        String getFormId()
        In version 1.x.x of this project, this will always be "asset-share-commons__form-id__1".
        Returns:
        the Form id, use to bind inputs to a form via <input form="${predicate.formId}"... >.

      • getGroup

        String getGroup()
        This value is initiated in internal initialized state. Multiple calls on the same Sling Model will return the same value.
        Returns:
        the auto-incrementing QueryBuilder group id.

      • isExpanded

        boolean isExpanded()
        Returns:
        true is the predicate view should be expanded.

      • isAutoSearch

        default boolean isAutoSearch()
        The support and implementation of autoSearch is component-implementation dependent.
        Returns:
        true if auto searching should be enabled for this predicate.

      • getComponentUpdateMethod

        default String getComponentUpdateMethod()
        Intended to drive the the data-asset-share-update-method attribute value in a component. It is up to each component to respect this value.
        Returns:
        the update method for this component.

      • getInitialValue

        String getInitialValue()
        GUIDANCE NOTICE It is (almost) always preferred to use getInitialValues() even if only one initial value is present as it allows for easier and better future-proofing and extension. Returns the initial value for this predicate. Depending on the predicate this may come from: - The query parameters - The authored component resource

        An example use of this is the fulltext predicate, which has only 1 predicate param and only 1 value.

        Returns:
        the initial value present, else null. If there are (or can be) many initial values, then this should return null and getInitialValues() should be used.

      • getInitialValues

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.ValueMap getInitialValues()
        Returns the initial value for this predicate. Depending on the predicate this may come from: - The query parameters - The authored component resource

        This method is intended for Predicates that can have multiple predicate params and/or multiple values per param.

        Returns:
        he initial values for this predicate.
